data.title: IV Therapy – Apollo Wellness
data.text:
IV Therapy

IV THERAPY

BOOK NOW

Intravenous (IV) therapy is a way of administering a high dose of minerals, vitamins, saline, nutrients, and other fluids directly into the bloodstream, causing immediate hydration and replenishment. Our team of expert facilitators can carry just about any tied to your direct needs, from weight loss to hangover/recovery.

Ricardo Wilson

Wellness Consultant

IV NAD+ (500MG) 2hrs $500

NAD+ or Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide, which is a coenzyme found in all living cells. NAD+ plays a crucial role in various biological processes, including energy metabolism, DNA repair, and cell signaling. NAD+ exists in two forms: Oxidized (NAD+) and reduced )NADH), and it functions as a carrier of electrons during cellular respiration.

IV NAD+ (1000MG) 3hrs $800

NAD+ or Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide, which is a coenzyme found in all living cells. NAD+ plays a crucial role in various biological processes, including energy metabolism, DNA repair, and cell signaling. NAD+ exists in two forms: Oxidized (NAD+) and reduced )NADH), and it functions as a carrier of electrons during cellular respiration.

NAD+ 1000MG Daily Dose (Monthly) $300

NAD+ or Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide, which is a coenzyme found in all living cells. NAD+ plays a crucial role in various biological processes, including energy metabolism, DNA repair, and cell signaling. NAD+ exists in two forms: Oxidized (NAD+) and reduced )NADH), and it functions as a carrier of electrons during cellular respiration.

IV – Hangover/Liver Detox 1hr $200

Hangover or liver detox IV therapy is a treatment offered at Apo11o Wellness. It involves the intravenous administration of fluids, vitamins, minerals, and other compounds with the goal of alleviating the symptoms of a hangover or supporting liver function after alcohol consumption.

When a person drinks alcohol, it can lead to dehydration and depletion of essential nutrients and electrolytes in the body. Hangover or liver detox IV therapy aims to address these issues by delivering hydration and replenishing nutrients directly into the bloodstream, bypassing the digestive system for more rapid absorption.

Saline, Dextrose, B12 & Thiamine

IV – Weight Loss 1hr $250

Weight loss IV therapy is a treatment option at Apo11o Wellness. The premise behind weight loss IV therapy is to provide a combination of fluids, vitamins, minerals, and other nutrients directly into the bloodstream via an intravenous drip to support weight loss efforts.

ALA, B6, L-Carnitine, Lippo C Injection.

Vitamin Blend Injection $20

Vitamin injections, also know as vitamin shots, involves administering a blend of vitamins directly into the muscle tissue. The benefits of a Vitamin shot help deliver essential nutrients to the body.

Vitamin C, B & Aminos to help you feel your best.

IV – Recovery 1hr $250

Recovery IV, also known as an intravenous hydration therapy or simply an IV drip, is a medical treatment where fluids, electrolytes, vitamins, and sometimes medications are administered directly into the bloodstream via an intravenous line. The purpose of a recovery IV is to quickly rehydrate the body and replenish essential nutrients that may be depleted due to various factors such as illness, dehydration, strenuous exercise, or excessive alcohol consumption.

Glutathione, Vitamin C, B12, BCAA’S & Zinc Sulfate

IV – Immune Boost 1hr $250

Immune Boost IV, also known as immune support IV or Immune system IV therapy, is a treatment offered at Apo11o Wellness. It involves the intravenous administration of fluids, vitamins, minerals, and other nutrients with the aim of supporting the immune system and promoting overall immune health.

B-Complex, Tri-Amino, Vitamin C, Glutathione.

Glutathione Injection $20

Glutathione injections involve administering the antioxidant Glutathione directly into the body, typically intravenously or intramuscularly. Glutathione is a tripeptide composed of three amino acids: Glutamine, cysteine, and glyince. Glutathione plays a crucial role in various physiological processes, including antioxidant defense, detoxification, and immune function.
